reviewText: Pretty boring stuff.  Don't waste your money.
Thank you for this rare film!

This Grindhouse double bill from the After Hours Cinema crew really manages to capture just how bizarrely lame porn could be 'back in the day' - and yet it also provides a fairly entertaining viewing experience.

The disc includes 2 'features' each about 60 minutes long - both are full screen and in color (albeit somewhat faded).  The first show entitled: "House of Kinky Pleasures" (1975) is the more creative of the duo. In it 'we' follow a slinky European madame wielding a long cigarette holder as she ushers the viewer into a series of 'rooms' at her bordello - each of which presents a vignette of purportedly perverse sexual action. Room #1 offers a femdom scene with a domme tormenting a bound dude in his boxers a bit B4 ultimately blowing him - Room #2 presents a mini hippy orgy featuring 2 guyz and 2 gurlz AND a box of KFC! - "Ummm - finger lickin' good!" - Room #3 contains a little inter-racial action as a pair of B&W studs 'pleasure' a white chick, and Room # 4 takes the political incorrectness to new heights by presenting a scenario where 2 'southern belles' get it on with a white guy in 'black face'. The 'archival' print from which this DVD was mastered is pretty ratch-ed out and displays a lot of 'classic' grindhouse ambiance via dancing scratches and un-edited drop-outs. XXX action (w/ cute girls) abounds, and it has a pretty cool eclectic grab-bag of music in itz sound-trak... very watch-able!

The subsequent 60 minutes are devoted to: "Pleasure Cruise" (1974).  This is a relatively mono-dimensional XXXercise involving a houseboat on a lake in Tennessee with a guy and 3 girls (a blond, a brunette, AND a redhead!) basically having sex, and dancing around naked on the top deck.

A minor plot twist is injected when a couple of other guys come paddling up in a kids inflatable swimming pool and horn in on the party for a while - BUT - the houseboat grrrls unleash their rampant libidos upon the interlopers and they run off with their 'tails' between their legs - while the houseboat sails on with its fornicating crew happily boogey-ing down to an amazing sound-trak of pilfered rock hits!  Classic.

These films were totally cheezy - in a good way - recommended.  Extras consist of trailers for other examples of After Hours Cinema - amusing 42nd Street filth.
